definition: (of a mountain) high and tapered peak or summit/mountain-like in appearance/highest level/classifier for camels
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty
peak power output (of an electrical device etc)
pinyin: feng1 zhi2 shu1 chu1 gong1 neng2

sentences.english: These negotiations matter hugely for the peak-oil debate.
sentences.chinese: 关于气候变化的协商对石油峰值讨论至关重要。

sentences.english: In that case, the price spike would be something like a dead-cat bounce.
sentences.chinese: 在那种情况下，股价峰值可能会像死猫诈尸一样反弹。

sentences.english: The maximum value of shrinkage stress of slabs before water storage increased obviously compared with that in the end of concrete placement.
sentences.chinese: 蓄水前面板干缩应力的峰值较浇筑结束时明显增大。

sentences.english: Input voltage peak limited to 600V for DC and low frequency.
sentences.chinese: 对直流和低频输入电压的峰值上限为600伏。

sentences.english: The static switch is sized to clear most short-circuits and transient current spikes.
sentences.chinese: 静态开关的大小来清除最短路和瞬时电流峰值。

sentences.english: The GGT peak value appeared early was good prognosis, contrarily was bad.
sentences.chinese: GGT升高峰值出现早的预后较好，反之差。

sentences.english: Stereo or Dual Mono operation of gating, compression and peak limiting.
sentences.chinese: 立体声或双单声噪声门，压缩和峰值限制操作。

sentences.english: Overall, British prices have only fallen about 12% from the peak.
sentences.chinese: 总体而言，英国房价仅比峰值时下跌了12%左右。

sentences.english: The thermoluminescence peak moves to the high temperature when the heating speed increasing.
sentences.chinese: 在实验升温速率增大情况下，该峰值将向高温区移动。

sentences.english: The peak value position shifting technology for spectral response of multialkali photocathodes is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了多碱光电阴极光谱响应峰值位置移动技术。

sentences.english: The peak acceleration must not exceed 250G for any of the impacts.
sentences.chinese: 峰值加速度不得超过250G的任何的影响。

sentences.english: The double peaks appear in the strength curve of gray iron treated by RE-Sb.
sentences.chinese: 用其处理灰铸铁时仍具有双峰值效应。

sentences.english: The peak value of platelet intracellular calcium oscillations was diminished.
sentences.chinese: 二磷酸腺苷诱导的血小板钙波动峰值降低。

sentences.english: And the isentropic efficiency and the total pressure ratio decrease with increasing the scales of the tip clearance.
sentences.chinese: 随着叶尖间隙的增加，峰值等熵效率一直降低。

sentences.english: Preceding the shear peak point, there is a slippage section presenting an ascending lateral shear curve;
sentences.chinese: 而侧阻力峰值之后的部分为粘结段，呈下凹衰减曲线。

sentences.english: When the proportion of methanol in the fuels increases, the peak heat release rate of premixed combustion increases.
sentences.chinese: 随混合油含醇率的增加，预混燃烧峰值也随之增加。

definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
